channel.title: dns on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in dns on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210225
item.description: Domain name system # DNS is a application layer service, it is run at the network edge. ttl = “time to leave”, expiration time NS = name server, this is the point of contact CNAME = canonical name, this is where you can specify a smaller name for a long name MX = mailserver Query and response are the same format. dig asks for the IP address of a site.
